name: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Storm Trilogy
overview: Start with Naruto's origins in Ultimate Ninja Storm, relive Shippuden and his ferocious battles with Akatsuki in Ultimate Ninja Storm 2, and experience the beginning of the Great Ninja War in Ultimate Ninja Storm 3, all in one game! In addition, each game comes packed with past DLC, including missions, outfits, episodes, and more!
